pr_title: GUI: Introduce password strength check for presence of login

timeline.bodyText: Do you need to perform these checks? Wouldn't the following conditions handle these situations?
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: You are right. There is no point in duplicate check.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
GUI: Introduce password strength check for presence of login

- Check that password doesn't contain login (case insensitive
  and unaccented) or backwards login.
  Login is checked only if longer than 2 chars to prevent
  false positive on short strings.
